house_listing.house_description: Gorgeous new project only 3 blocks to bay beach! 2 unit townhouse style condo's with brick & concrete siding, garages, 'and private elevators!!'. These units also offer gas heat,stove,hot water, and fp! Separate library/study, jetted tub, private park, 3 car parking & much more!!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Foyer, GarageDoor Opener, Microwave, Office, Walk-In Closet(s), Workshop
